H0.text: what is the third season of total drama. Total Drama Action

H1.text: what is the third season of total drama. Drama Island 2

H2.text: what is the third season of total drama. Total Drama Revenge

H3.text: what is the third season of total drama. World Tour

A4.text: Total Drama World Tour (often shortened as TDWT and formerly titled Total Drama, the Musical) is the third season of the Total Drama series.

A5.text: The original cast from this and past seasons do not compete in the next season, Total Drama: Revenge of the Island, as there is a new cast.
